ComicInfo.Title: Murder by Assassination Part 4
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary:
"Murder by Assassination" Part 4! Murder, mystery, and mayhem continue as the newest JOE continues her investigation into Cobra chaos. Can she, with the help of some special friends, solve the mystery and save the day before it's too late? The plot thickens as Living Legend Larry Hama and superstar artist Andrew Griffith (Transformers), continue their bombastic tale featuring the exciting new JOE team member-codename: SHERLOCK!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Andrew Lee Griffith (a) & J. Brown (c) | 1-2 | B | Cover B | Freddie E. Williams II (a) & Andrew Dalhouse (c) | 3 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Vic Hollins | 4 | RE | IDW Convention Exclusive Variant Cover A | Dave Johnson | 5 | RE | IDW Convention Exclusive Variant Cover B | Roi Mercado (a) & William Soares (c) | 6 |
